headline: Zacks.com featured highlights include ScanSource, TaskUs, Sally Beauty Brookfield Infrastructure and Edison International
summary: Zacks highlights five bargain stocks ScanSource, TaskUs, Sally Beauty, Brookfield Infrastructure, and Edison International with attractive EV-to-EBITDA ratios signaling strong value potential.
